body:
You talked nothing about number of nonzero elements. Can you expand the sentence a bit? It is not very obvious that indices is still 2d.

Also, other examples on empty tensors with different densities (i.e., `dense_dim`) would be helpful in explaining.

Also, other examples on empty tensors with different densities (i.e., dense_dim) would be helpful in explaining.
